name: PocketMine-MP 5.27.1
body:
**For Minecraft: Bedrock Edition 1.21.70**

This is a security release. Updating is strongly recommended.

Please see the changelogs for details.

ℹ️ Download the recommended PHP binary [here](https://github.com/pmmp/PHP-Binaries/releases/tag/php-8.1.27-pm8).

⚠️ Found a bug? Report it on our [issue tracker](https://github.com/pmmp/PocketMine-MP/issues/new/choose). **We can't fix bugs if you don't report them.**

name: PocketMine-MP 5.25.0
body:

Please see the changelogs for details.
